prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that glimmers like sunlight on the ocean waves.
I want a Pokemon with elegant fins and a shimmering body that glows underwater.
Generate a Pokemon that has a graceful swimming style and vibrant colors.
Make a fish Pokemon with a sleek design and colorful patterns on its body.
Imagine a Pokemon that represents the beauty of the sea with flowing fins and scales.
Design a water Pokemon that captivates with its bright colors and fluid movements.
Show me a Pokemon with an aquatic theme, showcasing its elegant features and colors.
